.. _`make_hexamer_table`:

MAKE_HEXAMER_TABLE
==================

Build a hexamer table for CPAT





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_cpat_make_hexamer_table:
        input:
            coding =
            noncoding =
        output:
            "hexamer_table"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/cpat/make_hexamer_table"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
